channel.title: vision on The views expressed
channel.description: Recent content in vision on The views expressed

item.title: 40,000 feet
item.description: Three to five-year vision What it will look, sound, feel like with successful implementation. Long-term outcomes and ideal scenarios. Visions represent larger outcomes that may take up to many years to create. Perhaps reviewed annually. Examples Known as the leading innovator in our industry, internationally. Have written a best-selling novel. Shooting par golf. Being conversational in two more languages. Have established a not-for-profit foundation recognized for its contributions to the community.
